body_html: Okay, I'm shooting in the dark now. Since the cp genrule works when run in the execroot manually, my next guess is something sandbox-related. Could you try to run the build with the --sandbox_debug command line option? For best results, do a build without the option, then a build with it so that the only rule that's run with debugging is the offending genrule. Otherwise you'd get quite a lot of log spam on the console.

body: Okay, I'm shooting in the dark now. Since the `cp` genrule works when run in the execroot manually, my next guess is something sandbox-related. Could you try to run the build with the `--sandbox_debug` command line option? For best results, do a build without the option, then a build with it so that the only rule that's run with debugging is the offending genrule. Otherwise you'd get quite a lot of log spam on the console.
